Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews

Class GUIConnectionLoadingView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews.GUIView
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews.GUIConnectionLoadingView
public class GUIConnectionLoadingView extends GUIView
Singleton class representing the connection setup view in the Graphical User Interface (GUI). It extends the GUIView class and implements methods for handling connection establishment and retry prompts.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews.GUIView

    stage, windowSize

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View

    CLIENT_CONTROLLER, VIEWMODEL

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    connectionLoadingScreen()
    Shows the loading screen while waiting for the connection to be established (if data is admissible), and prompts the current view state to start an attempt to connect to the server.
    static GUIConnectionLoadingView
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the GUIConnectionLoadingView, also initializing it if it had never been instantiated, as per the Singleton pattern.
    boolean
    retryConnectionPrompt(boolean causedByNetworkError)
    Displays a prompt popup, asking the user if they want to retry the connection after the failed attempt (due to a network error or nickname conflict).

      Returns the singleton instance of the GUIConnectionLoadingView, also initializing it if it had never been instantiated, as per the Singleton pattern.

    • connectionLoadingScreen

      protected void connectionLoadingScreen()
      Shows the loading screen while waiting for the connection to be established (if data is admissible), and prompts the current view state to start an attempt to connect to the server.
      Overrides:

    • retryConnectionPrompt

      public boolean retryConnectionPrompt(boolean causedByNetworkError)
      Displays a prompt popup, asking the user if they want to retry the connection after the failed attempt (due to a network error or nickname conflict).
      Overrides:
      retryConnectionPrompt in class GUIView
      Parameters:
      causedByNetworkError - True if the retry prompt is due to a network error, false if due to nickname conflict.
      Returns:
      True if the user chooses to retry, false otherwise.
